name: B2C User
sql: SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `root` WHERE ((IF((SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `main` INNER JOIN `customer_entity` AS `entity_table` ON main.entity_id = entity_table.entity_id WHERE (main.entity_id = :customer_id) AND (`main`.`group_id` = '6') AND (entity_table.website_id = :website_id) LIMIT 1), 1, 0) = 1))

name: B2B User
sql: SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `root` WHERE ((IF((SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `main` INNER JOIN `customer_entity` AS `entity_table` ON main.entity_id = entity_table.entity_id WHERE (main.entity_id = :customer_id) AND (`main`.`group_id` = '5') AND (entity_table.website_id = :website_id) LIMIT 1), 1, 0) = 1) OR (IF((SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `main` INNER JOIN `customer_entity` AS `entity_table` ON main.entity_id = entity_table.entity_id WHERE (main.entity_id = :customer_id) AND (`main`.`group_id` = '4') AND (entity_table.website_id = :website_id) LIMIT 1), 1, 0) = 1))
